data.title: Software Developer at NQode
data.subtitle: April 2024 - Present
data.excerpt: Built scalable front-end architectures using Angular and Next.js, with a focus on modular design, performance, and maintainability. Led initiatives to streamline development through reusable components, coding standards, and CI/CD workflows, resulting in faster feature delivery and improved team efficiency.

data.title: Frontend Developer at EPAM Systems
data.subtitle: February 2022 - April 2024
data.excerpt: Implemented dynamic, responsive front-end features with Angular and Sass, enhancing UX through polished UI components and animations. Optimized deployment with Docker and fostered strong cross-functional collaboration to ensure timely, aligned project delivery.

data.title: Frontend Developer at Codeplicity.
data.subtitle: February 2021 - February 2022
data.excerpt: Developed interactive web features using vanilla JavaScript, PHP, and HTML with a focus on performance and user experience. Employed modular SASS styling and Vagrant-based environments to ensure maintainability, visual consistency, and smooth team collaboration.
